TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ProfileProvider extends System.Configuration.SettingsProvider
Public MustInherit Class ProfileProvider Inherits SettingsProvider
public ref class ProfileProvider abstract : System::Configuration::SettingsProvider

summary.span: 定义 ASP.NET 为使用自定义配置文件提供程序提供配置文件服务而实现的协定。

span.span: Defines the contract that ASP.NET implements to provide profile services using custom profile providers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 配置文件提供持久存储和检索用户特定属性。ASP.NET profiles offer persistent storage and retrieval of user-specific properties. 配置文件属性值和信息以由实现确定的方式存储在数据源中。Profile property values and information are stored in a data source in a manner determined by the implementation. 您可以使用 .NET Framework 附带的配置文件提供程序 (由派生自抽象类的类表示), 也可以通过创建派生自的新类来实现您自己的提供程序。You can use the profile providers that are included with the .NET Framework (represented by the classes that derive from the abstract class), or you can implement your own provider by creating a new class that derives from . 创建自定义配置文件提供程序有两个主要原因。There are two primary reasons for creating a custom profile provider. - 你需要将配置文件信息存储在 .NET Framework 附带的配置文件提供程序不支持的数据源中, 如 FoxPro 数据库、Oracle 数据库或其他数据存储。You need to store profile information in a data source that is not supported by the profile providers included with the .NET Framework, such as a FoxPro database, an Oracle database, or other data stores. - 需要使用与 .NET Framework 附带的提供程序所使用的数据库架构不同的数据库架构来管理配置文件信息。You need to manage profile information using a database schema that is different from the database schema used by the providers that ship with the .NET Framework. 这种情况的一个常见示例是公司网络或网站的 SQL Server 数据库中已存在的用户数据。A common example of this would be user data that already exists in a SQL Server database for a company network or a Web site. 抽象类继承自抽象类 , 后者继承自抽象类。 The abstract class inherits from the abstract class, which inherits from the abstract class. 实现的类还必须实现和抽象类的必需成员。Classes that implement must also implement the required members of the and abstract classes. 有关实现配置文件提供程序的详细信息, 请参阅[实现配置文件提供程序](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58de6e99-31a7-41b9-93ed-51b9b4a67e98)。For more information about implementing a profile provider, see [Implementing a Profile Provider](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58de6e99-31a7-41b9-93ed-51b9b4a67e98). ## Examples 有关实现的示例, 请参阅[如何:生成并运行配置文件提供程序](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90f65aa9-82dd-4a86-97e6-911037bd6cfa)示例。For an example of a implementation, see [How to: Build and Run the Profile Provider Example](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90f65aa9-82dd-4a86-97e6-911037bd6cfa).

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不需要为继承抽象类的类实现构造函数。You are not required to implement a constructor for a class that inherits the abstract class. 实现的初始化值将传递给方法实现。Initialization values for a implementation are passed to the method implementation.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract int DeleteInactiveProfiles (System.Web.Profile.ProfileAuthenticationOption authenticationOption, DateTime userInactiveSinceDate);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 DeleteInactiveProfiles(valuetype System.Web.Profile.ProfileAuthenticationOption authenticationOption, valuetype System.DateTime userInactiveSinceDate) cil managed
Public MustOverride Function DeleteInactiveProfiles (authenticationOption As ProfileAuthenticationOption, userInactiveSinceDate As DateTime) As Integer
public: abstract int DeleteInactiveProfiles(System::Web::Profile::ProfileAuthenticationOption authenticationOption, DateTime userInactiveSinceDate);
abstract member DeleteInactiveProfiles : System.Web.Profile.ProfileAuthenticationOption * DateTime -> int

param.name: authenticationOption
param.span: 值之一，指定是删除匿名配置文件、已验证的配置文件还是同时删除这两种类型的配置文件。

span.span: One of the values, specifying whether anonymous, authenticated, or both types of profiles are deleted.

param.name: userInactiveSinceDate
param.span: 一个 ，确定将哪些用户配置文件视为处于不活动状态。

span.span: A that identifies which user profiles are considered inactive.

param.span: 如果用户配置文件的 值与此日期和时间相同，或在此日期和时间之前，则此配置文件被视为处于不活动状态。

span.span: If the value of a user profile occurs on or before this date and time, the profile is considered inactive.

summary.span: 在派生类中重写后，此方法删除最后一次活动在指定日期之前发生的配置文件的所有用户配置文件数据。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, deletes all user-profile data for profiles in which the last activity date occurred before the specified date.

returns.span: 从数据源中删除的配置文件的数目。

span.span: The number of profiles deleted from the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用于从数据源中删除未使用的配置文件数据。The method is used to remove unused profile data from the data source. 仅删除配置文件`applicationName`中指定的数据。Only data for the `applicationName` specified in the configuration file is removed. `authenticationOption`参数指定是否仅搜索匿名配置文件、是否仅搜索已通过身份验证的配置文件或所有配置文件。The `authenticationOption` parameter specifies whether only anonymous profiles, only authenticated profiles, or all profiles are searched. 删除在其中或指定`userInactiveSinceDate`的参数值之前发生的配置文件。Profiles in which the occurs on or before the specified `userInactiveSinceDate` parameter value are deleted. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示方法的实现的方法签名。The following code example shows the method signature for an implementation of the method. 有关完整实现的示例, 请参阅[如何:生成并运行配置文件提供程序](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90f65aa9-82dd-4a86-97e6-911037bd6cfa)示例。For an example of a full implementation, see [How to: Build and Run the Profile Provider Example](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90f65aa9-82dd-4a86-97e6-911037bd6cfa). [!code-csharp[System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider/CS/odbcprofileprovidersnippets.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider/VB/odbcprofileprovidersnippets.vb#3)]

summary.span: 在派生类中重写后，此方法删除与提供的用户名列表相匹配的配置文件的配置文件属性和信息。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, deletes profile properties and information for profiles that match the supplied list of user names.

returns.span: 从数据源中删除的配置文件的数目。

span.span: The number of profiles deleted from the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法删除`usernames`参数中指定的配置文件。 The method deletes the profiles specified in the `usernames` parameter. 仅删除配置文件`applicationName`中指定的数据。Only data for the `applicationName` specified in the configuration file is removed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示方法的实现的方法签名。The following code example shows the method signature for an implementation of the method. 有关完整实现的示例, 请参阅[如何:生成并运行配置文件提供程序](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90f65aa9-82dd-4a86-97e6-911037bd6cfa)示例。For an example of a full implementation, see [How to: Build and Run the Profile Provider Example](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90f65aa9-82dd-4a86-97e6-911037bd6cfa). remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法删除`profiles`参数中指定的配置文件。 The method deletes the profiles specified in the `profiles` parameter. 仅删除配置文件`applicationName`中指定的数据。Only data for the `applicationName` specified in the configuration file is removed. 在派生类中实现此方法时, `applicationName`可以使用提供的中的每个对象的值和属性来确定要从数据源中删除的配置文件。When implementing this method in a derived class, you can use the `applicationName` value and the property of each object in the supplied to determine which profiles to delete from your data source. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示方法的实现的方法签名。The following code example shows the method signature for an implementation of the method. 有关完整实现的示例, 请参阅[如何:生成并运行配置文件提供程序](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90f65aa9-82dd-4a86-97e6-911037bd6cfa)示例。For an example of a full implementation, see [How to: Build and Run the Profile Provider Example](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90f65aa9-82dd-4a86-97e6-911037bd6cfa). Public MustOverride Function FindInactiveProfilesByUserName (authenticationOption As ProfileAuthenticationOption, usernameToMatch As String, userInactiveSinceDate As DateTime, pageIndex As Integer, pageSize As Integer, ByRef totalRecords As Integer) As ProfileInfoCollection

public: abstract System::Web::Profile::ProfileInfoCollection ^ FindInactiveProfilesByUserName(System::Web::Profile::ProfileAuthenticationOption authenticationOption, System::String ^ usernameToMatch, DateTime userInactiveSinceDate, int pageIndex, int pageSize, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] int % totalRecords);
abstract member FindInactiveProfilesByUserName : System.Web.Profile.ProfileAuthenticationOption * string * DateTime * int * int * -> System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection

param.name: authenticationOption
param.span: 值之一，指定是返回匿名配置文件、经过身份验证的配置文件还是同时返回这两种类型的配置文件。

span.span: One of the values, specifying whether anonymous, authenticated, or both types of profiles are returned.

param.name: usernameToMatch
param.span: 要搜索的用户名。

span.span: The user name to search for.

param.name: userInactiveSinceDate
param.span: 一个 ，确定将哪些用户配置文件视为处于不活动状态。

span.span: A that identifies which user profiles are considered inactive.

param.span: 如果用户配置文件的 值与此日期和时间相同，或在此日期和时间之前，则此配置文件被视为处于不活动状态。

span.span: If the value of a user profile occurs on or before this date and time, the profile is considered inactive.

param.name: pageIndex
param.span: 要返回的结果页的索引。

span.span: The index of the page of results to return.

param.name: pageSize
param.span: 要返回的结果页的大小。

span.span: The size of the page of results to return.

param.name: totalRecords
param.span: 当此方法返回时，此参数包含配置文件的总数。

span.span: When this method returns, contains the total number of profiles.

summary.span: 在派生类中重写后，此方法检索最后一次活动在指定日期或指定日期之前发生并且用户名与指定用户名相匹配的配置文件的配置文件信息。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, retrieves profile information for profiles in which the last activity date occurred on or before the specified date and the user name matches the specified user name.

returns.span: 包含不活动配置文件的用户配置文件信息的 ，这些不活动配置文件中的用户名与提供的 参数相匹配。

span.span: A containing user profile information for inactive profiles where the user name matches the supplied parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用于检索用户名称与提供`usernameToMatch`的参数匹配的配置文件的未使用用户配置文件的配置文件信息。 The method is used to retrieve profile information for unused user profiles for profiles in which the user name matches the supplied `usernameToMatch` parameter. 仅返回配置文件`applicationName`中指定的数据。Only data for the `applicationName` specified in the configuration file is returned. `authenticationOption`参数指定是否仅搜索匿名配置文件、是否仅搜索已通过身份验证的配置文件或所有配置文件。The `authenticationOption` parameter specifies whether only anonymous profiles, only authenticated profiles, or all profiles are searched. 在搜索配置文件中, 将返回任何配置文件, 该配置文件在`userInactiveSinceDate`指定的参数值上或之前发生。Of the searched profiles, any profile with a that occurs on or before the specified `userInactiveSinceDate` parameter value is returned. 如果数据源支持其他搜索功能 (如通配符), 则可以为用户名提供更广泛的搜索功能。If your data source supports additional search capabilities, such as wildcard characters, you can provide more extensive search capabilities for user names. 返回的结果是`pageIndex`由和`pageSize`参数约束的。The results returned by are constrained by the `pageIndex` and `pageSize` parameters. 参数标识要在中返回的 对象的最大数目。 `pageSize`The `pageSize` parameter identifies the maximum number of objects to return in the . `pageIndex`参数标识要返回的结果页, 其中零标识第一页。The `pageIndex` parameter identifies which page of results to return, where zero identifies the first page. `out` `applicationName` `authenticationOption`参数是一个参数, 该参数设置为基于和`userInactiveSinceDate`参数配置的非活动用户配置文件的总数。 `totalRecords`The `totalRecords` parameter is an `out` parameter that is set to the total number of inactive user profiles for the configured `applicationName`, based on the `authenticationOption` and `userInactiveSinceDate` parameters. `applicationName`例如, 如果配置的有13个用户, `pageIndex`并且`pageSize`值为1且为 5, 则返回的将包含返回的第六个非活动配置文件。For example, if there are 13 users for the configured `applicationName`, and the `pageIndex` value is 1 with a `pageSize` of 5, the returned would contain the sixth through the tenth inactive profiles returned. `totalRecords`参数将设置为13。The `totalRecords` parameter would be set to 13. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示方法的实现的方法签名。The following code example shows the method signature for an implementation of the method. 有关完整实现的示例, 请参阅[如何:生成并运行配置文件提供程序](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90f65aa9-82dd-4a86-97e6-911037bd6cfa)示例。For an example of a full implementation, see [How to: Build and Run the Profile Provider Example](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90f65aa9-82dd-4a86-97e6-911037bd6cfa). [!code-csharp[System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider/CS/odbcprofileprovidersnippets.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider/VB/odbcprofileprovidersnippets.vb#5)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法返回配置文件的配置文件信息列表, 其中的用户名与提供`usernameToMatch`的参数相匹配。 The method returns a list of profile information for profiles in which the user name matches the supplied `usernameToMatch` parameter. 仅返回配置文件`applicationName`中指定的数据。Only data for the `applicationName` specified in the configuration file is returned. `authenticationOption`参数指定是否仅搜索匿名配置文件、是否仅搜索已通过身份验证的配置文件或所有配置文件。The `authenticationOption` parameter specifies whether only anonymous profiles, only authenticated profiles, or all profiles are searched. 如果数据源支持其他搜索功能 (如通配符), 则可以为用户名提供更广泛的搜索功能。If your data source supports additional search capabilities, such as wildcard characters, you can provide more extensive search capabilities for user names. 返回的结果是`pageIndex`由和`pageSize`参数约束的。The results returned by are constrained by the `pageIndex` and `pageSize` parameters. 参数标识要在中返回的 对象的最大数目。 `pageSize`The `pageSize` parameter identifies the maximum number of objects to return in the . `pageIndex`参数标识要返回的结果页, 其中零标识第一页。The `pageIndex` parameter identifies which page of results to return, where zero identifies the first page. `out` `applicationName` `authenticationOption`参数是一个参数, 该参数设置为基于和`userInactiveSinceDate`参数配置的非活动用户配置文件的总数。 `totalRecords`The `totalRecords` parameter is an `out` parameter that is set to the total number of inactive user profiles for the configured `applicationName`, based on the `authenticationOption` and `userInactiveSinceDate` parameters. `applicationName`例如, 如果配置的有13个用户, `pageIndex`并且`pageSize`值为1且为 5, 则返回的将包含返回的第六个非活动配置文件。For example, if there are 13 users for the configured `applicationName`, and the `pageIndex` value is 1 with a `pageSize` of 5, the returned would contain the sixth through the tenth inactive profiles returned. `totalRecords`参数将设置为13。The `totalRecords` parameter would be set to 13. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示方法的实现的方法签名。The following code example shows the method signature for an implementation of the method. 有关完整实现的示例, 请参阅[如何:生成并运行配置文件提供程序](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90f65aa9-82dd-4a86-97e6-911037bd6cfa)示例。For an example of a full implementation, see [How to: Build and Run the Profile Provider Example](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90f65aa9-82dd-4a86-97e6-911037bd6cfa). param.name: pageIndex
param.span: 要返回的结果页的索引。

span.span: The index of the page of results to return.

param.name: pageSize
param.span: 要返回的结果页的大小。

span.span: The size of the page of results to return.

param.name: totalRecords
param.span: 当此方法返回时，此参数包含配置文件的总数。

span.span: When this method returns, contains the total number of profiles.

summary.span: 在派生类中重写后，此方法从数据源中检索最后一次活动在指定日期或指定日期之前发生的配置文件的用户配置文件数据。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, retrieves user-profile data from the data source for profiles in which the last activity date occurred on or before the specified date.

returns.span: 包含有关不活动配置文件的用户配置文件信息的 。

span.span: A containing user-profile information about the inactive profiles.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用于检索未使用的用户配置文件的配置文件信息。The method is used to retrieve profile information for unused user profiles. 仅返回配置文件`applicationName`中指定的数据。Only data for the `applicationName` specified in the configuration file is returned. `authenticationOption`参数指定是否仅搜索匿名配置文件、是否仅搜索已通过身份验证的配置文件或所有配置文件。The `authenticationOption` parameter specifies whether only anonymous profiles, only authenticated profiles, or all profiles are searched. 在搜索配置文件中, 将返回任何配置文件, 该配置文件在`userInactiveSinceDate`指定的参数值上或之前发生。Of the searched profiles, any profile with a that occurs on or before the specified `userInactiveSinceDate` parameter value is returned. 返回的结果是`pageIndex`由和`pageSize`参数约束的。The results returned by are constrained by the `pageIndex` and `pageSize` parameters. 参数标识要在中返回的 对象的最大数目。 `pageSize`The `pageSize` parameter identifies the maximum number of objects to return in the . `pageIndex`参数标识要返回的结果页, 其中零标识第一页。The `pageIndex` parameter identifies which page of results to return, where zero identifies the first page. `out` `applicationName` `authenticationOption`参数是一个参数, 该参数设置为基于和`userInactiveSinceDate`参数配置的非活动用户配置文件的总数。 `totalRecords`The `totalRecords` parameter is an `out` parameter that is set to the total number of inactive user profiles for the configured `applicationName`, based on the `authenticationOption` and `userInactiveSinceDate` parameters. `applicationName`例如, 如果配置的有13个用户, `pageIndex`并且`pageSize`值为1且为 5, 则返回的将包含返回的第六个非活动配置文件。For example, if there are 13 users for the configured `applicationName`, and the `pageIndex` value is 1 with a `pageSize` of 5, the returned would contain the sixth through the tenth inactive profiles returned. `totalRecords`参数将设置为13。The `totalRecords` parameter would be set to 13. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示方法的实现的方法签名。The following code example shows the method signature for an implementation of the method. 有关完整实现的示例, 请参阅[如何:生成并运行配置文件提供程序](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90f65aa9-82dd-4a86-97e6-911037bd6cfa)示例。For an example of a full implementation, see [How to: Build and Run the Profile Provider Example](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90f65aa9-82dd-4a86-97e6-911037bd6cfa). [!code-csharp[System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider/CS/odbcprofileprovidersnippets.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider/VB/odbcprofileprovidersnippets.vb#7)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用于检索所有配置文件的配置文件信息。The method is used to retrieve profile information for all profiles. 仅返回配置文件`applicationName`中指定的数据。Only data for the `applicationName` specified in the configuration file is returned. `authenticationOption`参数指定是否仅搜索匿名配置文件、是否仅搜索已通过身份验证的配置文件或所有配置文件。The `authenticationOption` parameter specifies whether only anonymous profiles, only authenticated profiles, or all profiles are searched. 返回的结果是`pageIndex`由和`pageSize`参数约束的。The results returned by are constrained by the `pageIndex` and `pageSize` parameters. 参数标识要在中返回的 对象的最大数目。 `pageSize`The `pageSize` parameter identifies the maximum number of objects to return in the . `pageIndex`参数标识要返回的结果页, 其中零标识第一页。The `pageIndex` parameter identifies which page of results to return, where zero identifies the first page. `out` `applicationName` `authenticationOption`参数是一个参数, 该参数设置为基于和`userInactiveSinceDate`参数配置的非活动用户配置文件的总数。 `totalRecords`The `totalRecords` parameter is an `out` parameter that is set to the total number of inactive user profiles for the configured `applicationName`, based on the `authenticationOption` and `userInactiveSinceDate` parameters. `applicationName`例如, 如果配置的有13个用户, `pageIndex`并且`pageSize`值为1且为 5, 则返回的将包含返回的第六个非活动配置文件。For example, if there are 13 users for the configured `applicationName`, and the `pageIndex` value is 1 with a `pageSize` of 5, the returned would contain the sixth through the tenth inactive profiles returned. `totalRecords`参数将设置为13。The `totalRecords` parameter would be set to 13. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示方法的实现的方法签名。The following code example shows the method signature for an implementation of the method. 有关完整实现的示例, 请参阅[如何:生成并运行配置文件提供程序](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90f65aa9-82dd-4a86-97e6-911037bd6cfa)示例。For an example of a full implementation, see [How to: Build and Run the Profile Provider Example](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90f65aa9-82dd-4a86-97e6-911037bd6cfa). abstract member GetNumberOfInactiveProfiles : System.Web.Profile.ProfileAuthenticationOption * DateTime -> int

param.name: authenticationOption
param.span: 值之一，指定是返回匿名配置文件、经过身份验证的配置文件还是同时返回这两种类型的配置文件。

span.span: If the of a user profile occurs on or before this date and time, the profile is considered inactive.

summary.span: 在派生类中重写后，此方法返回最后一次活动在指定日期或指定日期之前发生的配置文件的数目。

returns.span: 最后一次活动在指定日期或指定日期之前发生的配置文件的数目。

span.span: The number of profiles in which the last activity date occurred on or before the specified date.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用于检索所有未使用的用户配置文件的计数。The method is used to retrieve a count of all unused user profiles. 仅返回配置文件`applicationName`中指定的数据。Only data for the `applicationName` specified in the configuration file is returned. `authenticationOption`参数指定是否仅搜索匿名配置文件、是否仅搜索已通过身份验证的配置文件或所有配置文件。The `authenticationOption` parameter specifies whether only anonymous profiles, only authenticated profiles, or all profiles are searched. 在搜索的配置文件中, 将对任何配置文件, 该配置文件`userInactiveSinceDate`在指定的参数值上或之前发生。Of the searched profiles, any profile with a that occurs on or before the specified `userInactiveSinceDate` parameter value is counted. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示方法的实现的方法签名。The following code example shows the method signature for an implementation of the method. 有关完整实现的示例, 请参阅[如何:生成并运行配置文件提供程序](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90f65aa9-82dd-4a86-97e6-911037bd6cfa)示例。For an example of a full implementation, see [How to: Build and Run the Profile Provider Example](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90f65aa9-82dd-4a86-97e6-911037bd6cfa).
